A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely hate everything about this movie\, from the cheap Saturday Night Live comedy to the total disrespect of the Star Wars lore and it's fans!   Luke Skywalker was treated like a grumpy old man!  Laura Dern's character was a total joke and embarrassment!  There was absolutely nothing I liked about this movie!  And FYI I am not an alt- right\, woman-hating Neo Nazi!  I am a very liberal Democrat!
